import React, {useEffect} from 'react' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { Button, Table } from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import AnimatedPage from '../components/AnimatedPage' import { listOrders } from '../actions/orderActions' function OrderListScreen({ history }) { const dispatch = useDispatch() const orderList = useSelector(state => state.orderList) const {loading, error, orders} = orderList const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin)//userInfo Ã¨ l'istanza di un oggetto con un valore bool isAdmin const { userInfo } = userLogin //destructuring useEffect(() => { if(userInfo && userInfo.isAdmin){ dispatch(listOrders()) }else{ history.push('/login') } }, [dispatch, history, userInfo]) // if () else if () else () A?B:C?D:E return (

Orders

{loading ? () : error ? ({error}) : ( {orders.map(order => ( ))}
ID USER DATE TOTAL PAID DELIVERED
{order._id} {order.user && order.user.name} {order.createdAt.substring(0, 10)} ${order.totalPrice} {order.isPaid ? ( order.paidAt.substring(0, 10) ) : ( )} {order.isDelivered ? ( order.deliveredAt.substring(0, 10) ) : ( )}
)}
) } export default OrderListScreen
